articles.title: McDonald's to buy back all its Israeli restaurants

articles.title: Israel: GPS disabled and IDF leave cancelled over Iran threat

articles.title: Israel says it will open new aid routes into Gaza

articles.title: Hard rock band Kiss sells brand and songs for $300m

articles.title: New cause of asthma damage revealed

articles.title: Thieves stole $30m in cash in one of the biggest heists in LA history
